thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Baoding Lucky Innovative Materials sees FY 2017 net profit to down 10 pct to up 10 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Baoding Lucky Innovative Materials sees FY 2017 net profit to down 10 pct to up 10 pct

organizations.name: baoding lucky innovative materials co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Baoding Lucky Innovative Materials Co Ltd
* Says it sees FY 2017 net profit to decrease by 10 percent to increase by 10 percent, or to be 97.2 million yuan to 118.8 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 108 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/oA9JYS
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
